com.fluffy_minions.prototype.IDAS

Class Breakfast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluffy_minions.prototype.IDAS.GenericMeal
      • com.fluffy_minions.prototype.IDAS.Breakfast

  • public class Breakfast
extends GenericMeal
    The class Breakfast contains the food that can be chosen for breakfast and the minimum requirements for breakfast.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Breakfast

        public Breakfast(SQLiteHelper sqLiteHelper,
         PersonalProfile personalProfile)
        This constructor retrieves the food from the appropriate tables and stores it. Also, it computes the minimum requirements for the current profile and generates meals.
        Parameters:
        sqLiteHelper - interacts with the database
        personalProfile - information about a person (age, weight, height, activity level)
